kyc.title: Verify your ID
kyc.subHeaderText:
To comply with regulatory entities, we need you to upload photos of the front and back of official documents. They will be uploaded to our servers to be validated. 

 This process takes about 24 hours and is mandatory to operate with our application.
kyc.subHeaderTextAlert: Charges might be applied depending on your accounts currency.

membership.warning: You are requesting a change to your membership that will be applied immediately if you confirm that you agree.
finalConfirmation: You are about to subscribe to the {{name}}* membership.
By clicking "Continue" you will be accepting Demo's Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Once you have confirmed, you will be charged {{monthly_fee}} to your associated card.
* The subscription will automatically renew unless you cancel your subscription before the current billing cycle has ended. Any change can be made through your Demo account settings.
membership.finalSuccess: Your membership has been successfully upgraded!
bankPayoutSwiftFeeInfo: In all the SWIFT transfers a {{percentage}} on the amount of the transfer is applied (minimum {{value}}), in the two following cases the commission is applied.
If you make a transfer that exceeds the minimum of {{value}} the full fee will be charged.
If you make a transfer that doesn't exceed the minimum of {{value}}, a fee of {{value}} will be charged.
Example: {{percentage}} commission on {{sampleBFormat}} = {{sampleBResult}} (the charge will be {{value}})

sendcode.waitingListMessage:
We are currently presenting a high demand for registration on our platform. To maintain the quality that identifies us and we want to provide, registration for new users will have a waiting time of no more than 48 hours.

Press the continue button enter your phone and email, and you will be part of our waiting list.

Very soon you will receive a notification notification to complete your registration on our platform.

unverifiedBusiness: Hello! To continue with the validation process, we need you to send us the following documentation to support@demo.me or WhatsApp:
4. Presentation of the current/envisaged business model that includes
¬∑ Products or services offered by the entity
5. Main goals int the next 3 years:
In case of being an entity, we also need:
2. Last IEER report (Independent External Expert Review)
5. Complete the KYC for legal entities once the previous steps have been completed.
Attention! Income movements over 3,000 euros to the EU, must be accompanied by their respective invoices and must be sent to @Demo Technologies or support@demo.me with the attached files.

complaienceMsg.title: Something is wrong!
content: We've detected a suspicious behavior in your account, thats why we're investigating it.
We will notify you as soon as it's resolved.

addBncBank.affiliationQuestionText: Now that you have validated your documentation (c√©dula, passport or extension) link the BNC account to Demo. Remember that with c√©dula you are required to have one. If you don't have one yet, here's how to start managing it.
affiliationLinkedText: To be able to do the bonding process you must first obtain the credentials card by following these steps:
2. Check the "Transfers" tab, and then the "BINGO BNC" tab.
3. Answer the security questions and then the system will show you a sending message with a security code and select "Accept".
4. Register the received code in the cell phone and then the BINGO file will be generated in PDF format.
5. Open the file and save it or print it out to use it in the Demo Wallet affiliation process.
1. Enter your "Card Number", place the "Identity Card Number" and indicate your "Password".

When you access your account you can select the option "Wallet" where you should go to the section and visualize the "Affiliation" in case you need to register a new Virtual Wallet. To register a new Virtual Wallet, you must choose the following options:
1. Select the Virtual Wallet of your preference.
2. Choose the currency account of your property that you want to affiliate to the service.
3. Enter the assigned code. The validation code corresponds to the telephone prefix together with your mobile number, in this case: {{mobilePrefix}} {{mobileNumber}}.
4. Press "Continue" > Once you have affiliated the available Virtual Wallets, the system will show you each one of them in detail, through the following option: Directory.
affiliationHowText: If you are a new BNC customer:
2. Press the BNC Client Pre-Registration button and follow the steps.
3. Deposit in one of theBNC Agencies the necessary funds to open your BNC Account in Bolivars (Current, Savings).
4. Once you visit the BNC Agency, indicate to the Promoter that you also want to open an account in BN currency.
If you are already a BNC customer:
2. Contact your Business Executive or visit the BNC Agency of your choice to make arrangements.

3. Remember that even if you already have a BNC Account in Bolivars, you must have the BNC Foreign Currency accounts in order to link them to Demo and be able to operate with them, since the App handles Euro and Dollar.
